artist: Artist: Utagawa Sadafusa; Publisher: Jōshūya Jūzō / Jūbei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: standing fremale figure, wearing a blue kimono with white floral medillions and a brown and white geometric patterned obi
inscription: (Died on April 8, Tenpō 7, at the age of 41, buried Nichren sest Jōshinji Temple, Fukagawa); posthumous name: {Shinsōin baiga nissō shinji}; Farewell poem
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of Iwai Hanshirō VI
